changelog.en:
## SimpleCLSX v1.0.0 - Initial Release

### Features
- RGB color control with real-time preview
- Brightness adjustment (0-255 levels)
- 7 preset colors for quick access
- Sequence playback (built-in and custom)
- Custom .raw sequence upload support
- Firmware update with DFU support
- Automatic driver installation (Windows)
- Dark mode interface
- Professional OTA update system

### Technical Features
- Thread-safe USB communication
- Automatic device detection
- Cross-platform support
- Comprehensive logging
- CRC validation for data integrity

### Getting Started
1. Connect your CLSX cabinet
2. SimpleCLSX will auto-detect and install drivers
3. Start controlling your LED lighting!

No updates currently available - you're running the latest version!
